title: Science Basic Concept Education Program Utilizing Blended Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific vocabulary and ability to understand simple sentences
context.additional_context: Offline-centered integrated language and science education combined with smartphone-based supplementary learning

learning_goals: Learners can utilize 50 daily science-related vocabulary terms with 80% accuracy
Learners can explain science experiment procedures in three or more steps using smartphone apps
Learners can present science concepts in Korean for five or more minutes in small-group discussions
Learners can independently use digital literacy tools (recording/photography) with over 70% proficiency in blended learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
